content: So what I would say as Garo has said, we are laser-focused on our botensilimab program because the Phase 1, which is now an extended Phase 1 program is showing really remarkable activity in a number of solid tumors, and the data continues to be encouraging. For example, the expenses associated with 1571 through Phase 1 clinical trials is, relatively modest and compounds such as our CD137 are also advancing rapidly with the potential of the option holder exercising the option, which will -- when it happens, which will bring in significant additional cash resources into the company.
